title: Why do I feel a pulse in my upper lip? - Quora

response.answer_text: Due to weak musclar activities , weak muscles , poor blood circulation , weak nerve activities , may , and may be due to some other reasons too . , i think …..this may be experienced by every one in their life . Many times it might be happen that one particular part get over sensitive and we feel that , as our pulse is beat. Stress , panic , weakness , high bp level , high sugar level ……..etc in body make us feel like that . Have sufficient water , have lemon juice daily , eat less salt and sugar , take liquid diet and nutritious food . Take care , follow all precautions . Thank you . NAMESTE .

That answer can very your lip like the rest of you has vains and if you hit it on something and it swelld it's not uncommon it will throb which may feel like a pulse tho if you didn't you might wanna check your pulse from your neck or wrists to see if it is at a normal beat not to fast or strong or to slow that means count your pulse with each beat the average adults pulse is 60 to 100 beats per minute I am not a nurse by any means so please take this with a couple grains of salt
